dict.acceptation: 面包；食物；营养，营养物；生计；

sent.orig: We have Italian white bread, fragrant cheese bread, wheat bread, honey oat bread and garlic bread.
sent.trans: 我们有意大利白面包，香奶酪面包，全麦面包，蜂蜜燕麦面包和蒜蓉面包。

sent.orig: What kind a bread would you like? Soft bread, Hard roll, French bread or Rye bread?
sent.trans: 请问你喜欢哪一种面包呢？我们有软包、硬包、法包和麦包，你要哪一种呢？

sent.orig: W:Soft roll, French bread, raisin bread, hard rolls, rye bread and plain bread.
sent.trans: 软小面包、法国面包、葡萄面包、硬小面包、裸麦面包以及白面包。

sent.orig: Baking great bread is as easy as pie with this new bread maker.
sent.trans: 有了这个新面包机，烤出上好的面包真是小菜一碟。

sent.orig: I haven't got any corn bread, but I've got some wheat bread. Will that do you?
sent.trans: 我没有玉米面包，但有些小麦面包。行吗？
